verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1525> and was passing <WG1330> through Jericho <WG2410>.

And <WG2532> he ran <WG4390> on before <WG1715>, and climbed up <WG305> into <WG1909> a sycomore tree <WG4809> to <WG2443> see <WG1492> him <WG846>: for <WG3754> he was <WG3195> to pass <WG1330> that <WG1565> way <WG1223>.

And <WG2532> another <WG2087> came <WG2064>, saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, behold <WG2400>, here is thy <WG4675> pound <WG3414>, which <WG3739> I kept <WG2192> laid up <WG606> in <WG1722> a napkin <WG4676>:

for <WG1063> I feared <WG5399> thee <WG4571>, because <WG3754> thou art <WG1488> an austere <WG840> man <WG444>: thou takest up <WG142> that <WG3739> which thou layedst <WG5087> not <WG3756> down <WG5087>, and <WG2532> reapest <WG2325> that <WG3739> which thou didst <WG4687> not <WG3756> sow <WG4687>.

then <WG2532> wherefore1223, Acts1 gavest <WG1325> thou <WG1325> not <WG3756> my <WG3450> money <WG694> into <WG1909> the bank <WG5132>, and I <WG302> at <WG2532> my <WG1473> coming <WG2064> should have required <WG4238> it <WG302> with <WG4862> interest <WG5110>?

But <WG4133> these <WG1565> mine <WG3450> enemies <WG2190>, that <WG3588> would <WG2309> not <WG3361> that I <WG3165> should reign <WG936> over <WG1909> them <WG846>, bring <WG71> hither <WG5602>, and <WG2532> slay <WG2695> them before <WG1715> me <WG3450>.
And <WG2532> when he had <WG2036> thus <WG5023> spoken <WG2036>, he went <WG4198> on before <WG1715>, going up <WG305> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>.

And <WG2532> it came to <WG1519> pass <WG1096>, when <WG5613> he drew nigh <WG1448> unto <WG1519> Bethphage <WG967> and <WG2532> Bethany <WG963>, at <WG4314> the mount <WG3735> that is called <WG2564> Olivet <WG1636>, he sent <WG649> two <WG1417> of the disciples <WG3101>,

And <WG2532> he answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, I tell <WG3004> you <WG5213> that <WG3754>, if <WG1437> these <WG3778> shall hold their peace <WG4623>, the stones <WG3037> will cry out <WG2896>.
